## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6f6b905daf64e276ca8caef8989a1d7964855db0456a4512fb566fbecda0c79d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'amazon-event' @ 999.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
